Was easy to integrate into an existing CodeIgniter site with a horrible admin template. Th","description_html":"

Constellation is a powerfull admin skin for building advanced backends, both for desktop and mobile users. It provides a wide range of styles from data visualization to lists and calendars, all fluid and nestable. This skin is build on HTML5 and CSS3 , and is powered by jQuery for maximum user experience.

Updated to v1.5! See at the bottom for a detailed list of changes.

“Wonderful work on the template, it has been an absolute pleasure to work with, well documented, well designed, 10 out of 10. The best $20 I have spent in a long time” – lvismer

“Visually stunning! Love it! Very clean and easy to modify code without cluttering things up. Was easy to integrate into an existing CodeIgniter site with a horrible admin template. Thanks!” – 2bytes

“Absolutely amazing! This was more than worth the purchase! Great job, and thanks for your amazing work!” – allaspects

“Constellation is one of the most comprehensive, well-documented, well-planned projects we’ve ever seen. Cheers to great work!” – daveromero

Features

  • HTML5 & CSS3 markup
  • Fluid or fixed layout, based on 960 grid system
  • 47+ elements styles, with multiple variations
  • jQuery powered, fully functional even if JS is disabled
  • Satellite backend pages are provided: login, error with report sending, 404’s…
  • Mobile version included – for iPhone, Android and all webkit-based mobile browsers – compatible with main template content styles
  • All elements are fluid (sizes are in EMs): resize just by adding a class
  • Detailled documentation with complete styles and functions references
  • 2 background colors : light and dark

Pages included in the package

  • Main page with examples of all included styles:
    • Favorites list
    • Statistics with filters
    • Week & month planning
    • Control panel
    • Simple and complex forms
    • Advanced table block
    • Data grid view
    • File manager
    • 4 calendars styles
    • Tasks and blocks
    • Toolbar
    • Multiple lists styles
    • Help
    • Wizard and image gallery
  • Login with working ajax/php script (compatible with the mobile version)
  • Error page with report sending, fully fonctionnal (compatible with the mobile version)
  • Error documents: 400, 401, 403, 404, 500 and 503 (compatible with the mobile version)
  • Mobile pages
  • Older browser ‘Please update’ notice page, with working detection

Included styles

  • Navigation with infinite levels
  • User status bar with breadcrumb
  • Fixed edition bar, stays on top of screen
  • Fixed footer buttons
  • New! Modal windows
  • Drop-down menu with infinite levels, embeddable in many elements
  • Content box with glass border, block controls and a dedicated tabs style
  • 3 nestable tabs styles
  • Forms with collapsible fieldsets, visual required/validation styles and iPhone-like switches
  • 5 messages styles
  • User planning with timelines, milestones, breaks, unavailable periods, current time…
  • Table with sort arrows
  • Tiny, medium, large and list calendars with multiple events listing styles
  • New! Week calendar view
  • Wizard steps
  • Image gallery and preview
  • 20 different list styles with multiple variations:
    • Bulleted list
    • Keywords
    • Tags
    • Small pagination
    • Picto list
    • Simple list
    • Collapsible list
    • Definition list
    • Accordion list
    • Files tree
    • Favorites
    • Shortcuts
    • Files list
    • Grid list
    • Tasks list with tags and comments
    • Blocks & mini-blocks list
    • Icon list
    • Small files icon list
    • Extended list

Functions

  • Automatic setup: no extra JS needed to enable template effects, even on AJAX loaded content
  • Working AJAX /php login script
  • AJAX instant search-form results
  • New! Flexible modal windows using existing content, ajax or iframe
  • Full featured error page, with report sending form
  • CSS and JS files compression system, easy to use (no server customization required)
  • Nestable tabs, with content height equalization, events on show/hide to setup content and browser back button enabling
  • Built-in tips system, with both CSS or JS setup
  • Multiple dedicated plugins: accessibleList (long lists pagination), ajax real-time search field…
  • Older browsers detection (redirect to a ‘Please update’ notice page)
  • Context menu (right click) plugin, with easy building function
  • Closable elements, just by adding one span inside
  • Growl-like notifications and block messages in just one function call
  • Ajax loading effect, with animation and Retry/cancel message on error
  • New! Table sorting with DataTable plugin
  • New! Date selector with DatePicker plugin

Template package content

  • HTML only template
  • HTML + PHP template
  • All template PSD files: main, mobile, special pages, favicons and slices
  • Detailled documentation with complete styles and functions references + code samples

Credits

  • Fugue Icon Set
    Copyright © 2009 Yusuke Kamiyamane – http://www.pinvoke.com/
  • FineFiles Icon Set
    Copyright © Plain Style – http://plainz.oh.land.to/download_icon.html
  • Flags Icon Set
    Copyright © FamFamFam – http://www.famfamfam.com
  • Web Application Icon Set
    Copyright © WebAppers.com – The icons are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license.
  • DataTables
    Copyright Allan Jardine © 2007-2010
    DataTables is dual licensed under the GPL v2 license or a BSD (3-point) license.
  • jQuery DatePicker
    Copyright © Keith Wood

Changelog

  • v1.0
    • Initial release
  • v1.1
    • Template changes:
    • Several CSS bug fixes
    • Added 3 new styles
    • Added modal windows styles and controls
    • Added -webkit-background-clip: padding-box; to styles using border radius (see http://tumble.sneak.co.nz/post/928998513/fixing-the-background-bleed)
    • Added week calendar
    • Added function resetTabContentHeight() to reset tabs content-blocks heights
    • Fixed a bug in old-browsers.js in function getCookieParams()
    • Fixed a bug in $.fn.addTemplateSetup()
    • Various JS template setup functions optimizations
    • Added DatePicker
    • Added DataTable
       
    • Documentation changes:
    • Added changelog
    • Added optimization instructions
    • Added modal window documentation
    • Added DataTable plugin integration example
    • Added DatePicker plugin integration example
    • Updated several sections
  • v1.2
    • Template changes:
    • Add support for class .menu-opener for main nav sub-menu and H1
    • Improved performance and support of .files class
    • Improved tab switching to avoid screen flickering when content is smaller than the viewport
    • Added support for tool-tips for switches
    • Added support for input keep-logged in login script
    • Enabled error_reporting level check in error reporting script
    • Fixed a CSS bug when using spans and inputs in block controls
    • Fixed a CSS bug causing hidden text in main menu tabs to show
    • Fixed a bug in function getDefaultTabIndex() when used with jQuery 1.4.3
    • Fixed a bug in function $.fn.modal()
    • Fixed a bug in old-browsers.js
    • Fixed a bug in error reporting sending script
  • v1.5
    • Added a new main menu style, without big icons and allowing a custom logo
    • Added a month planning style
    • Added a red style for breadcrumb
    • Improved the modal window to allow using an iframe for the content
    • Several other tweaks and fixes to the modal window lib
    • Use of Modernizr to enable feature detection and improve compatibility (removed html5.js)
    • Updated most external javascript libs to their latest version
    • Improved the mobile menu to handle screen rotation/resizing
    • Improved the login page message box to allow any content height
    • Improved the class menu-opener to allow using the opening button as a link
    • Added CSS fix to use the datepicker in modal windows
    • Added a disabled style for inputs/selects/textarea
    • Several new basics CSS styles
    • Several minor CSS fixes
    • Fixed a bug in CSS /JS minimizing
    • Fixed a bug with reversed drop-down menus
    • Fixed the dark background height issue

Monster Admin is a popular open source WebApp template for admin dashboards and control admin panels. Monster is fully responsive HTML template, based on the CSS framework Bootstrap 4. It utilizes all of the Bootstrap components in its design and re-styles many commonly used plugins to create a consistent design that can be used as a user interface for backend applications. Monster Admin is based on a modular design, which allows it to be easily customised and built upon.

Flycase is the Ultimate Wordpress Solution for Musicians and Artists

Flycase is a professional and easy-to-use Music Wordpress Theme. It is highly and easily customizable, ready for all devices, simple to set up and e-commerce ready.
A Theme dedicated to Music Lovers. Whether you are a profesional or not, your theme includes all features you need for your band or label, to present, promote and sell your work online.
Of course, your theme can be used for any purpose as well!

If you are a Wordpress beginner or an expert, you will find just what you need to create a neat Music Website to build your presence online.

“WolfThemes makes the best WordPress templates for music I’ve ever seen. The built-in features are far above the competition. Clear and well-documented, the code is simple to modify. And the support is outstanding.”
— Bill Evans, executive producer and manager, Flying Colors

“Perfect for anything related to music, with loads of features. Great design too – will make any picture really stand out and give a unique feeling to each and every site. My favorite part is the gallery but this template is really a gem.”

Showcase


http://kamelot.com/


http://simplythreemusic.com/


http://stephanielynn.com/


http://nazelite.com/


http://endbeginband.net/


http://alessiacohle.com/

Want to showcase your website here? Submit it to showcase@wpwolf.com

Main Features

  • User friendly — easy to use!
  • Easy to set up
  • Fully Responsive
  • Retina ready — Compatible with WP Retina 2x plugin
  • Translation ready — ready to use with WPML plugin
  • WooCommerce included — The best e-commerce solution
  • Revolution Slider included ($15 value)

  • Unlimited Customization — Set the style of your website with live preview! thanks to the WP customizer! (colorpicker, backgrounds uploaders etc…)
  • Complete background options for each area of each page/post including parallax
  • Multiple Playlist — Advanced mp3 player to spread your music online!
  • Store — ready to sell your music online!
  • Photo Galleries — Masonry Layout
  • Discography
  • Tour Dates
  • Video Gallery
  • Video thumbnails generator
  • Supports blog post formats
  • Contact Form 7 included — Create your contact form instantly
  • Google font manager
  • 27 Social Icons available — Fill your Social Profile URLs in the theme options
  • Social Share Buttons
  • 2 lightbox options : swipebox or fancybox
  • Unlimited sidebars, unlimited widget areas — to widgetize any page.
  • SEO ready
  • Instagram Gallery
  • Complete Documentation with videos tutorials & screenshots
  • Automatically create the default pages on theme installation
  • Automatic Plugins Installation on theme activation
  • Child Theme Template included
  • Demo XML file included (just in case the default pages are not enough)
  • Update Notifications
  • Compatible with all WolfPlugins (obviously)
  • Support forum available
  • Built on the WolfFramework, freakin’ clean, solid and respectfull of Wordpress standards.

You can create text courses, vid","description_html":"












Real Reviews


Say hello to our all new EducationPress WordPress theme. EducationPress is a theme that is perfectly suitable for colleges, universities, academies, education centers, and everyone that needs a powerful learning management system (LMS). The theme is built from the base up with the sole purpose to be the one stop solution to offer the best LMS experience, and be the best WordPress education theme on the planet.

EducationPress is based on the CoursePress Pro Plugin (worth of $228 for Free & Trusted by 50,000+ members) from WPMUDev. This is one of the best plugin that is available in the market that will help you to quickly create beautiful courses using WordPress and nothing else. You can create text courses, video-driven courses, create quizzes, share audio, allow users to upload and download and participate in discussions. It allows you to easily create a course, invite students, instructors and even promote them based on their performance. Students too, can track their study progress from their workbook, and upon completion of course, they are awarded certificate with unit wise grade.

CoursePress Pro have the ability to offer course for free, or sell access to your lessons and materials with simple e-Commerce integration. You can use any of the 13+ payment gateways available with MarketPress to start selling courses quickly.

When it comes to looks, EducationPress is a seriously stunning looking theme with pixel perfect design. The theme is crafted for perfection and importance is given to each and every element that is used in this theme, be it buttons, icons, graphics or text. Of course, this theme is responsive, which means it will work great on any device, be it PC, mobile or tablet. An eye-catching theme that works great; that’s EducationPress.

We know that a theme not only has to look great, but also work great. That’s why our theme comes with lots of useful features that makes it stand out from the competition.

EducationPress makes use of the free and simple to use Page Builder Plugin by SiteOrigin. Page Builder allows you to create responsive pages with simple drag and drop interface. This means that you will not need to write even a single line of code to build any type of pages but if you know CSS, then you can always enter your custom CSS and CSS classes easily.

EducationPress is a feature rich theme and has a whole lot of theme options to customise and configure your e-learning website. This theme is customisable with layout settings and several other theme options panel based on Redux Framework plugin.

EducationPress features
  • Since this theme uses CoursePress Pro plugin (trusted by 50,000+ users), you can create courses and units for each course.
  • Add an image, text, video or a downloadable document for your course.
  • Create assignments and questionnaire to grade your students.
  • Students can maintain their workbooks.
  • Unit wise grading system for students.
  • Students can ask queries to instructors via the discussions.
  • Create free or paid courses.
  • Allow instructor to choose the students who can enroll for the course.
  • Anyone who completes a pre-requisite course can enroll for the course.

Compatible with BBPress
bbPress is forum software with a twist from the creators of WordPress. Easily setup discussion forums inside your WordPress.org powered site.

Compatible with BuddyPress
BuddyPress helps you build any type of community website using WordPress, with member profiles, activity streams, user groups, messaging, and more.

Compatible with WooCommerce
WooCommerce is a free eCommerce plugin that allows you to sell anything, beautifully. Built to integrate seamlessly with WordPress, WooCommerce is the world’s favorite eCommerce solution that gives both store owners and developers complete control.

Gallery
Create custom image galleries using the in-built Gallery page template.

Events
Create various events with expiry countdown.

Testimonial
Add testimonials from your website’s users.

Blog Posts
Add blogs posts for different formats such as: Text, Image Gallery, Image, Video, Audio and Quote.

Page Templates
EducationPress comes with 14 in-built page templates.

  • Our instructors
  • Blog template
  • Contact us
  • Gallery
  • Events
  • Courses
  • Page builder
  • Course Dashboard
  • Login
  • Signup
  • Edit profile
  • Enrolment process
  • Coming soon
  • Wish-listed courses

Icons
The theme supports more than 1000 icons from Font Awesome and Linearicons.

FlexSlider
FlexSlider is one of the best responsive slider out there, and we’ve bundled that with the theme. Your slider will look great, be it on PC, smartphone or tablet.

SEO friendly
EducationPress is SEO friendly and you can also use any SEO plugin out there.

Shortcodes
With EducationPress, adding different type of elements to your website just got easier, all thanks to the use of shortcodes. Here’s a list of shortcodes that our theme supports out-of-the-box:

  • Typography
  • Alerts
  • Accordions
  • Tabs
  • Lists
  • Buttons
  • Columns

Sorting and Filtering
Our theme is bundled with very useful sorting and filtering functionality. Your website visitor can filter the courses by price (free or paid), language and category. Sorting by popularity, ratings, newest, oldest, name and price (low to high and high to low) is also supported.

EducationPress uses some popular plugins to make your e-learning website the best out there:

  • With the RichReview Plugin your users will have the option to write reviews on the courses.
  • MailChimp allows you to add a custom and effective newsletter to your website.
  • Contact Form 7 adds a fully functional and easy to use contact form to the Contact Page template. You can always use a different plugin, if you prefer.
  • With the MarketPress plugin of the CoursePress Pro you can easily sell your courses online.
  • Page Builder by SiteOrigin allows you to create custom pages easily with its dynamic drag and drop feature.
  • Widgets Bundle plugin by SiteOrigin provides a whole list of widgets in Page Builder for you to create dynamic content for your web pages.
  • Metabox Plugin makes the life very easy when it’s comes to creating custom post meta.

Support
We aim to offer 5 star support to all of our buyers. We will offer regular bug fixes, updates and support whenever you are stuck. And yes, you will also get detailed theme documentation in the theme package. For pre-sales questions, you can always contact us from our Profile page here at Themeforest, and if you’ve purchased our theme, then visit our support desk and create a support ticket. Don’t worry, we’re happy to help.

    Bring new life in your agency, start-up or corporation with an amazing business theme for WordPress

    The Complete Corporate WordPress Theme

    Built upon over 6 months of research, Showoff incorporates every module you can possibly imagine needed for creating a remarkable agency website. We’ve gathered feedback from tens of successfull entrepreneurs and business owners to create what surely is the ultimate tool in building your company’s website. You won’t ever need to touch a single line of code while creating your agency’s website. Using our great remastered version of the Visual Composer and over 300 individually styled templates just waiting for you to piece them together, you’ll have a unique great website to go with your business in no time.

    The best creative agency wordpress theme

    Being a creative agency ourselves, we really wanted to make Showoff a theme which would easily be a perfect fit for creative agencies and web enthusiasts around the world. This is why a big part of the process was finding enough data to justify the creation of certain elements. We managed to gather info about the most important elements all internet businesses needed and provide our clients with an amazing array of fine tuned solutions.

    Create an amazing real estate website

    A large part of Showoff’s inspiration came from the real estate and construction business industries. We dedicated a good part of our work and a whole homepage for this niche, thus providing even more value to our WordPress theme.

    A perfect photography WordPress theme

    Featuring a one-of-a-kind slider and a rocking personal description, Showoff’s photography/portfolio homepage is a photographer’s dream. It allows for amazing imagery to be used, while also providing valuable information about his skills and packages. Do you think it’s missing something? Don’t worry – you’ll have over 80 shortcodes you can use to piece together to the current layout and make it unique.

    A word about speed:

    Fast load speed is extremely important in the modern world, and has become one of the key factors in Google’s search algorythms. That’s why having a fast loading website is so important for your business. Using Showoff you’ll be on your way to great SERP success given the theme’s lightweight approach to coding.

    This will be your best investment in SEO

    We all know how important SEO is, and how sensitive it can be to get it right. Showoff will be your best investment in SEO as it will provide a great foundation for you to build on. Getting the basics right when it comes to SEO is absolutely vital.

    Responsive – Since responsiveness has become such an important factor in the modern-age web, we can’t take this lightly. Having a highly responsive theme is vital for your site.

    Drag&Drop Page Builder – Benefit from our remastered version of the Visual Composer and harness the full pottential of the drag & drop builder. Smartly constructed shortcodes and layouts make site building a breeze. ($34 value)

    1 Click Demo Data / Sample data Installer – Make setting up extremely easy using the BigBangThemes 1 click demo installer.

    Theme Options Pannel – Control every aspect of your website through an easy to use interface. Change everything from looks to site details from the BigBangThemes Theme Options Pannel.

    Google Fonts – Get access to hundreds of different Google fonts and use them with ease.

    80+ Shortcodes – Use any of our 80+ shortcodes to build completely unique pages.

    One Page Site – Easily build a single page website with Showoff’s amazing features and one page navigation

    Search – Our custom search functionality makes the traditional search function an impressive one with custom functionality and styling

    WooCommerce – Transform your WordPress site into a complete eCommerce store a single click (and for absolutely no additional cost). The Showoff theme is fully integrated with the now so popular commerce plugin WooCommerce, making for an extremely easy to set up shop.

    Marketing – Now with a copy of Showoff you get so much more than you would with a standard WP Theme. Our amazing dedicated support is ready to help guide you with the use of info gathered from industry experts, on how to massively improve your site’s looks and content to reach a larger fanbase. Receive 1 on 1 training on how to harness the theme’s best features to supercharge your website’s Google Search Ranking and audience count.

    Layout Choice – Pick & choose from dozens of layout options and shortcodes to create a truly unique website.

    Page Templates – Creating completely unique pages has never been easier. Just pick one of our great page templates and you’ll be well on your way to creating an exquisit page.

    Sidebars for every occasions – Easily change sidebars between pages and different custom post types, and display different content fo each.

    An unique Helpdesk Feature – Showoff is the only theme that incorporates a complete helpdesk into a corporate WordPress theme. Build a great website for your company and back it up with a thorough knowledge base.

    Slider Revolution – We don’t only support, but also include the premium Slider Revolution plugin for free. ($15 value)

    Contact Form 7 – Showoff harnesses the full pottential of the popular contact plugin, the Contact Form 7. We styled it to perfection and made good use of the amazing plugin.

    Integrated Social Sharing – Stop worrying about having to find different plugins to share content. Showoff has a built-in solution for social sharing.

    PSD Photoshop Files – We went ahead and included all PSD files for the theme, for those of you who would like to style some of the elements differently starting from the original.

    Custom Post Types – We extended the WordPress functionality with loads of high quality Custom post types – Services, Portfolio, Knowledgebase

    SEO Ready – Showoff is fine-tweaked and Search Engine Optimized. Including schemas (microdata) and fine-tweaks to give your site the best chance to rank on Google.

    RTL ready – Our theme is right to left ready out of the box for languages which require this (ex: arabic, chinese)

    Timely Updates – Our number one priority is to make sure that Showoff gets constant updates so that your site never has to suffer from bugs or lack of features.

    Child Theme Compatible (& included) Showoff comes with a child theme built by us out of the box. This will make for very easy theme customizations.

    Template 16 – Video in Email description

    • The Video is coded with HTML5 and will work in Apple mail, iPad and iPhone. Other mail clients see a fallback image of your choice
    • Replace your .mp4 URL in the first input field on the left menu called “Video”. The .mp4 video is showing in your Email and on the web in the Safari browser.
    • Replace your .ogg or .ogv URL in the second input field on the left menu “Video”. The .ogg or .ogv videolink isn’t mandatory but we advice to add this video format to support a range of webbrowsers (like Firefox or Google Chorme).
    • Replace your fallback image in the third input field on the left tab called “Video”. The fallback image is meant for Email clients that don’t support html5 videos in Email so your image will be shown.
    • MailChimp don’t accept HTML5 video’s, it’s impossible to send an email with video through their system. If you export your file as a MC file you will see a normal 600 pixel fixed width image (like the fall-back image). The HTML5 video is working when sending your email through Campaign Monitor, Constant Contact, or some other Email platforms.
    • You can check the Autoplay button if you want to send your Email with a Autoplay function.
    • If you don’t understand how to convert a video we advise to use an video converter on the web (like clipconverter.cc) or download an video coverter App.
    • If you don’t have a video URL yet, no worries, we have a test .mp4 and .ogv URL so you can see it works. Copy paste this URL: http://www.rocketway.net/video/marketing.mp4 in the first input field on the left menu “Video”. Copy paste this URL: http://www.rocketway.net/video/marketing.ogv in the second input field on the left menu “Video”.
    • Optional width for the overlay image: 600px width x 329px height.

    Theme Builder

    Regarding the frequent question where to find the full version of our themebuilder here’s a quick explanation: In the download you’ll see a folder called “Themebuilder” open it and click on the link to get access to the full unlocked themebuilder.

    Note: The Themebuilder files aren’t included, the download includes a link which gives you access to the Themebuilder.

    Overview

    eziCMS is an fresh and easy going admin skin, which comes with a lot of cool features, like html5 & css3 enhancements, tweets, jQuery & jQuery UI(both the newest), animations, WYSIWYG editor, lightbox with 5 styles and lots more. There are 4 version in this pack, eziFlex(flexible), eziCMS(1000px), eziMINI(600px) and an mobile version which usses the new jQuery mobile library(the first one here onThemeForest) + a BONUS site template. This all comes in 7 fresh styles. eziCMS has a lot of pre made elements instead of the most skins here which has just one or two pages filled with random stuff. eziCMS can be used for any kind of cms system(backend and even frontend), but this depens all on your own knowledge ofcourse.


    Please notice that the demo has a couple of minify files in it(and some changes), this is to help my server run faster deu hightraffic on the demos, and to let you switch between some functions! The files that you will download will not be minifyd!! And for those with good eye you see that the datepicker button doesn’t change, this is only in the demo.

    If you have bought this file and you want to leave an testimonial please contact me! Thanks!


    The theme’s has been tested on an iPad and they work fine
